subject: thank you notes 4/24
body: i'm thankful to have nailed a folded up blanket over our front window so the glare of its white light wouldn't distract from lemonade. i'm thankful for the concept of the gesamtkunstwerk, which is a way to try to frame the experience we had in the dark. i'm thankful for artists who break frames with baseball bats (and then remake them with grace).
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful to have nailed a folded up blanket over our front window so the glare of its white light wouldn't distract from lemonade. i'm thankful for the concept of the gesamtkunstwerk, which is a way to try to frame the experience we had in the dark. i'm thankful for artists who break frames with baseball bats (and then remake them with grace).
